history.title: Added streaks feature, daily stats, and export flagged questions. Opened app to public
changes: Major Update: To ensure I have time to continue updating the app and make improvements, I have opened the app open to public. If this app has helped you please kindly help by sharing this app to your groups!
Feature: Added feature to keep a streak like snapchat of how many days you have been doing practice questions. Includes daily questions completed and the accuracy of today.
Feature: Added export flagged questions feature to copy and paste all flagged questions into google doc/word

history.title: Fixed remaining incorrectly formatted EMQ questions
changes: Questions: Fixed MCQs that were originally EMQs and had dirty question text ie. QUID 3380

history.title: Minor backend changes for scalability
changes: System: Handle users with more than 1000 questions completed by fetching via pagination. Increased max row reads to 10000 as a fallback
System: Refactored version management to optimise edge function calls

history.title: Happy New Year! Changes on EMQ classification
changes: Questions: The program mistakenly classified EMQ as short answers before. Changed the question database so that EMQs are now classified as MCQs.

history.title: Professor AI feature toggle, added image to question
changes: Feature: Added toggle button at the top to show toggle Professor AI usage
Questions: Added image to question. Images are added manually so report any questions that need images added
Bugfix: Fixed notes panel showing cards with empty notes
System: Backend improvements to roles and permissions

history.title: Questions minor visual update
changes: Bugfix: Minor update on questions rendering visuals

history.title: AI usage cost update, minor bug fixes and UI updates
changes: Pricing: The AI usage is adding up and the project is running out of budget. Will need to start charging for each time you consult Professor AI. There is an estimated cost for each AI model option (price varies depending on input and output length) and your actual cost is displayed at the top. Press the button to reveal full AI usage history.
Refactor: Placed SAQ sub parts parts (a), (b), (c) ... into new lines instead of big paragraph chunk
Bugfix: Fixed text disappearing in SAQ user input
UI: Added Katex rendering so math and science notation can be rendered nicely
UI: Added question unique ID (QUID) so that specific questions can be referenced quickly
System: Optimised database fetching to improve egress data usage

history.title: Fixed sorting bug. Additions to sort and feedback.
changes: Bugfix: Fixed sort by new not actually sorting by newest questions
Feature: Added sort by random
Refactor: Added community tab in feedback form to track feedback progress and add comments
Refactor: Improved search bar so it's more responsive

history.title: Added nice formatting for notes and solutions, allow images in notes. Allow for question redo without deletion of notes
changes: Feature: Allow formatting in notes, as well as adding images to notes. Can just paste image in notes but that will eat up your quota fast and cost a lot of money. Better to upload image to an image hosting site like imgur first and link it in notes. Visually there is no difference, it is just more annoying because you need to upload the screenshot to imgur first.
Feature: Allow redoing a question. Press and hold the 'Done' button to redo. REDOING A QUESTION WILL ERASE YOUR PREVIOUS ANSWER AND SCORE. Notes will not be erased.
Feature: Added sort by with notes first
Internal: Refactored question states, progress pandel, and accuracy statistics calculation. Allow null scores to accomodate redoing a question.

history.title: More questions and added estimated cost
changes: Questions: Added questions from 'Med SAQ 2018-2023' and 'Final MB SAQ' google drives
Feature: Added UI to see estimated cost. If we reach 100%, we will need to split the $25 USD per month pro plan. You can see your estimated share amount in HKD. (top left)
Feature: Top right you can download your data as a json file for backup. Implemented this in 2.3.0 but don't think anyone saw it. See version history notes for details of each version update.
UI: Popup for new version notes so easily seen
Up next: allow adding images to notes.

history.title: Lost progress bug fix
changes: Major fix: New download button caused progress not showing on the front end. Don't worry your data is still in the database. Fixed now. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.

history.title: Updates to notes panel and added download data button
changes: UI: Refactored notes button so that it shows before clicking mark done button. Notes panel now opens from the side, allowing you to see the question and answers while typing notes.
UI: Added feature to sort questions by incorrect first

Feature: Added download button to download all your progress and notes as a json text file. The data stored on the server is generally safe as it is stored in the cloud. The only way the data will be lost is if cloud server corrupts or if I accidentally delete the database. If you want peace of mind, you can downlaod your data periodically.
Up next: Seperate family medicine as its own big topic.

history.title: Sort by oldest and suggestions for improvements

history.title: Confirmation dialog for unmarking question as done
changes: UX: Unchecking a question as "Done" previously wiped your notes instantly. We added a safety confirmation dialog to ensure you never lose your study notes or scores by accident again
System: Backend upgrades to user management and onboarding flows.

history.title: SAQ Improvements & Progress Panel
